divs: Sighting DetailsI was watering lawm in front of my home, I have a clear view of the sky and it was a perfect cloudless day. at about a 45 degree angle moving from east to west I see a silent slow moving ridged metalic looking boat just floating across the sky. oddly enough it didnt surprise me nor scare me. without a shadow of a doubt in my mind this was not a blimp, balloon, military or civillian craft. It was like a floating black boat? needless to say it was the most strange thing I have ever seen. since then ive constantly look up in the sky and have seen additional bizare craft but none like this.
Summary: slow movimg metalic boat looking triangle. no sound, no vapor trail. moved right in front of me. saw perfect details
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around July 15th 2006
